author: michaelfD5092DB
title: Great downtown spot
text: Best place to stay in Battery Park. You can walk to so many locations from the ferrys to Ellis /liberty island to 911 and World Trade Center, Trinity Church, And views on NY Harbour and the Hudson River. so much history in this area and the beginnings of NYC becoming the center of the Universe.
